title: BMI Calculator
description: Develop a program to calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) based on a person's weight and height. If the BMI is below 18.5, the person is underweight. If the BMI is between 18.5 and 24.9, the person is normal weight. If the BMI is between 25 and 29.9, the person is overweight. If the BMI is above 30, the person is obese.
